CREATE TABLE EMPLOYEE ( EMPLOYEE_ID INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, USER_ID INT, FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(50), LAST_NAME VARCHAR(50), POSITION_ID INT, MANAGER_ID INT, EMAIL VARCHAR(100), FOREIGN KEY (`POSITION_ID`) REFERENCES `POSITION`(`POSITION_ID`), FOREIGN KEY (`MANAGER_ID`) REFERENCES `EMPLOYEE`(`EMPLOYEE_ID`), FOREIGN KEY (`USER_ID`) REFERENCES `USER`(`USER_ID`)
);
